narrative.iWantTo: I test Pantheon User Account Page of Ticket Master Developer's site

scenario.title: (developer-acct.ticketmaster.com/user/1554/apps) Verification for general page's elements [2.2.3.4 Login - Password field - enter valid password]
scenario.step: When navigate to Pantheon LogIn page from Home page
When navigate to Pantheon User Account page from LogIn page

Then check general page elements for Pantheon User Account pageorg.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<T[here are no applications here. Create something]!> but was:<T[HESE ARE YOUR APPS! EXPLORE THEM]!>
